blogContent.title: S3-DST: Phan tich va theo doi trang thai hoi thoai mo trong ky nguyen LLM
blogContent.description: Binh luan va danh gia tom tat

children.value: Tac gia: Sarkar Snigdha Sarathi Das, Chirag Shah, Mengting Wan, Jennifer Neville, Longqi Yang, Reid Andersen, Georg Buscher,

Van de theo doi trang thai hoi thoai (DST) truyen thong nham theo doi so thich va y dinh cua nguoi dung trong cac cuoc tro chuyen giua nguoi dung va dai ly. Mac du du phong cho cac he thong hoi thoai huong nhiem vu ho tro cac ung dung trong linh vuc hep, su xuat hien cua cac he thong chat dua tren mo hinh ngon ngu lon (LLM) da mang lai nhieu tinh tiet phuc tap trong cac cuoc hoi thoai mo. Nhung tinh tiet phuc tap nay bieu hien dang tang do phuc tap trong cac tuong tac ngu canh, cac phien hoi thoai keo dai bao gom nhieu chu de da dang, va su thay doi ngu canh thuong xuyen hon. De xu ly nhung tinh tiet phuc tap nay phat sinh tu cac he thong chat dua tren LLM dang phat trien, chung toi de xuat phan doan hoi thoai chung va theo doi trang thai theo tung phan trong cac he thong hoi thoai mo. Gia dinh trong mot cai dat khong co kich ban phu hop voi mot he thong hoi thoai mo thuc su, chung toi de xuat S3-DST, mot ky thuat thuc day co cau truc su dung Pre-Analytical Recollection, mot co che dinh vi moi chung toi thiet ke de cai thien viec theo doi ngu canh dai. De chung minh hieu qua cua cach tiep can duoc de xuat trong viec phan doan chung va theo doi trang thai, chung toi danh gia S3-DST tren mot bo du lieu hoi thoai mo vo danh rieng cung nhu cac bo du lieu DST va phan doan cong khai. Tren tat ca cac bo du lieu va cai dat, S3-DST lien tuc vuot troi so voi trang thai cua nghe thuat, chung minh suc manh va do ben vung cua the he tiep theo cua cac he thong chat dua tren LLM.
S3-DST: Phan tich va theo doi trang thai hoi thoai mo trong ky nguyen LLMXuat ban vao Ngay 15 thang 9·Noi bat trong
vao Ngay 18 thang 9Tac gia: Sarkar Snigdha Sarathi Das, Chirag Shah, Mengting Wan, Jennifer Neville, Longqi Yang, Reid Andersen, Georg Buscher,

Van de theo doi trang thai hoi thoai (DST) truyen thong nham theo doi so thich va y dinh cua nguoi dung trong cac cuoc tro chuyen giua nguoi dung va dai ly. Mac du du phong cho cac he thong hoi thoai huong nhiem vu ho tro cac ung dung trong linh vuc hep, su xuat hien cua cac he thong chat dua tren mo hinh ngon ngu lon (LLM) da mang lai nhieu tinh tiet phuc tap trong cac cuoc hoi thoai mo. Nhung tinh tiet phuc tap nay bieu hien dang tang do phuc tap trong cac tuong tac ngu canh, cac phien hoi thoai keo dai bao gom nhieu chu de da dang, va su thay doi ngu canh thuong xuyen hon. De xu ly nhung tinh tiet phuc tap nay phat sinh tu cac he thong chat dua tren LLM dang phat trien, chung toi de xuat phan doan hoi thoai chung va theo doi trang thai theo tung phan trong cac he thong hoi thoai mo.
